Class VariableLengthRandomWriter

java.lang.Object

      uk.ac.bristol.star.feather.VariableLengthRandomWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
FeatherColumnWriter
public abstract class VariableLengthRandomWriter
extends AbstractColumnWriter

Partial FeatherColumnWriter implementation for random access variable-length data types.

Since:
26 Feb 2020

Constructor.

Parameters:
name - column name
ftype - feather data type
nrow - number of rows
isNullable - whether the column may contain values that need to be flagged as null in the validity mask
userMeta - optional user metadata string, probably should be JSON

writeDataBytes

public long writeDataBytes(java.io.OutputStream out)
                    throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from class: AbstractColumnWriter
Writes the bytes constituting the data stream for this column, excluding any optional validity mask. Note the output does not need to be aligned on an 8-byte boundary.

Specified by:
writeDataBytes in class AbstractColumnWriter
Parameters:
out - destination stream
Returns:
number of bytes written

createStringWriter

public static FeatherColumnWriter createStringWriter(java.lang.String name,
                                                     java.lang.String[] data,
                                                     java.lang.String userMeta,
                                                     boolean isNullable)
Utility method to create a column writer from a String array.

Parameters:
name - column name
data - data array
userMeta - optional user metadata string, probably should be JSON
isNullable - if true, null values will be flagged; if false, they will just be written as zero length
Returns:
column writer
